Articles.Content: Ive recently been having a bit of an issue with my Mount and Blade save, i started noticing that after a while, my character's strength level dropped from 16, all the way to 10, and their agility from 1 to 0. if anyone know whether this is an intended feature, or a bug please let me know. I also feel i should mention that i am using the Game of Thrones "A Clash Of Kings" mod.
Don't they have a forum that you could place this in? Like this?: http://forum.paradoxplaza.com/forum/forumdisplay.php?410-Mount-amp-Blade-DLCs
Indeed they do, but i've known this to be a remarkably responsive forum
Yeah it is, and I would've helped you, but I had no idea this game even existed. This forum is great for replying- assuming plenty of people know about it.

but I had no idea this game even existed

Its a really good game! Getting a bit old now though.

Shoveycat: I've never encountered that before so I assume its a bug.

What Brethern asked.

The game does have a feature where stats will decay after a certain amount of game time.
